channel.title: Server Control Panel - A new evolution
channel.description:
Welcome.
I'd say this is one of my greatest ideas. This control panel allows you to edit directly from the command prompt. It finds commands and loads them from the client.java. It opens and downloads/edits databases. You can also link this up with your client (not yet been tested) which I will test soon and keep you updated. [b]This control panel allows you to edit and play without compilation.[/b]
[img]http://img39.imageshack.us/img39/9319/addan.jpg[/img]

item.title: Server Control Panel - A new evolution
item.dc:creator: @Slivion Slivion
item.description:
@Slivion wrote:

Well, I suppose so. It wouldn’t be much harder than the batch file. I’ll have a look into this asap. Thankyou.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Control Panel - A new evolution
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

_ikram:

Nice, you should make a GUI for it.

Agreeing with this post; you should make the GUI have access to the files, so you can edit from the GUI, compile and run it. Basically having full control.
